content.question: What trend does Ms. Suzuki mention?

choices.label: Students are eating too many high-calorie foods.
The cafeteria is offering students fewer healthy options.
Students are buying their lunches at convenience stores.
Students are not getting enough exercise.

content.answer: Students are eating too many high-calorie foods.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
